FuncDef: RSTP automatically falls back to STP mode when it receives an STP BPDU. Theclear detected-protocolscommand forces the system to revert to the default RSTP mode on the SAP or spoke SDP.

ParaDef.Info: Clears the specified lease state SAP information.
The SDP ID to be cleared. Values-1 to 17407.
The virtual circuit ID on the SDP ID to be cleared. Values-1 to 4294967295.
